name: Street Fighter 6: Mad Gear Box
summary:
The Mad Gear Box is the physical collector's edition of Street Fighter 6, it includes the mad gear box itself, Pop Up Parade Figures of Luke and Kimberly, the artbook, a sticker set, the Figure Diorama Board, a standard physical edition of the game and a code for the Year 1 Ultimate Pass.

The Year 1 Ultimate Pass includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).
